channel.title: rat-os/ratos
channel.description: An OS focusing on making klipper more approachable

item.title: RatOS 2.1.0-RC4 released!
item.description:
- Major improvements to beacon workflow and first layer accuracy and reliability. - Plus support for the new [Rat Rig V-Core 4.1](https://ratrig.com/collections/v-core-4) printer and upgrades.
A fresh installation is required - existing 2.1.0-RC3 installations will not be updated automatically.
See the ⁨release notes⁩ for more information: https://github.com/Rat-OS/RatOS/releases/tag/v2.1.0-RC4
